sentences.en: driving in the middle lane of the motorway
sentences.cn: 在高速公路的中间车道上行驶

sentences.en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentences.cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentences.en: His message was aimed at the undecided middle ground of Israeli politics.
sentences.cn: 他所传达的信息针对的是以色列政局中尚未表态的中间派。

sentences.en: His middle son died in a drowning accident five years back.
sentences.cn: 他排行居中的那个儿子5年前意外溺水身亡。

sentences.en: His sisters are grown up and his parents are middle-aged.
sentences.cn: 他的姐妹们都已成人，而他的父母亲也人到中年。

sentences.en: I went on competing till I was in my middle forties.
sentences.cn: 我继续参赛，直到45岁左右。

sentences.en: Men tend to put on weight in middle age.
sentences.cn: 男人到了中年往往会发福。

sentences.en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

sentences.en: Mr Cook is intending to go to the Middle East on Friday.
sentences.cn: 库克先生打算周五去中东。

sentences.en: Of course, slap-bang in the middle of town the rents are high.
sentences.cn: 当然啦，市区正中心的租金是很高的。

sentences.en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
sentences.cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

sentences.en: The bulk of the book concerns Sandy's two middle-aged children.
sentences.cn: 书中主要描写桑迪的两个已到中年的孩子。

sentences.en: The hotel is set plumb in the middle of the high street.
sentences.cn: 宾馆正好坐落在商街的中段。

sentences.en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentences.cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: the middle drawer of the filing cabinet
sentences.cn: 档案柜中间的抽屉

sentences.en: The popular ceramics industry expanded towards the middle of the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 到19世纪中期，大众制陶业得到了发展。

sentences.en: There are plenty of small houses for sale, and quite a lot of very large ones, but very little in the middle.
sentences.cn: 在售的小房子很多，大房子也有不少，但是不大不小的很少。

sentences.en: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
sentences.cn: 文例句：假期的中间一段他们是在佛罗里达州度过的。

sentences.en: This message caused perturbation in the Middle East Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这则消息在中东总部引起了不安。

sentences.en: We rowed out towards the middle of the lake.
sentences.cn: 我们朝湖中央划去。

words.tran_cn: 中间的，中部的；中级的，中等的

phrases.tran_cn: 中东（一般泛指欧，亚，非三大洲连接的地区）

trans.tran_cn: 当中的，中间的，中等的，年龄居中的，折中的
trans.tran_en: nearest the centre and furthest from the edge, top, end etc
the part that is nearest the centre of something, and furthest from the sides, edges, top, bottom etc
